data.name: Zombie Spree: The Dawn
data.detailed_description:
So it began...

 After years of researching the most deadly viruses in secret laboratories placed around the world, the human race created one that will destroy us all. It started with so-called fake news and conspiracy theories. Everyone was skeptical about news from exotic countries. Those damn fools!
When it escalated it was already too late. No one was prepared... Except you, a group of friends, and your families. Here is your final stand.

You stored ammunition, weapons, vehicles, and even secret technologies.

You found and fortified defensive positions.

All that is left is to survive or die trying!



In Zombie Spree: The Dawn you will face waves of hungry zombies coming your way. You will have a large variety of weaponry at your disposal with practically unlimited ammunition. If this is your end then let's make it fun at least!



Key fatures:

  • mass zombies: waves of zombies want to get through your defenses and slaughter the remaining survivors. Defend them at all costs!




  • multiple weapons: there are many weapons at your disposal. From standard trusty machine gun, grenades, and Molotov cocktails to secret army technology self-teleporting auto-aiming gun turrets. Don't worry about ammunition limits and give them hell!




  • blood & gore: Nothing feels better than crushing zombies and turning them into piles of blood and body parts. Enjoy your last moments!
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Zombie Spree: The Dawn is a perfect game if you want to relax after a tough day, shoot some zombies and turn them into a pile of blood using a large variety of weaponry. No need to move and jump around like a goof, just aim and shoot!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 10

content_descriptors.notes: No fancy violence here but simple blood effects and gore body parts flying in the air.
